name: VRchery
description:
(This game REQUIRES a Oculus Rift AND Touch Controllers)

(Requires SteamVR)

Hi, my name is Jeshua. I am a game and app developer with the passion to bring awesome games to you! 

My latest game VRchery is all about aim, you actually have to shoot the bow with skill and ACTUALLY close one eye to get better aim!!

Features.....

1. Fire!! You can dip the arrow in fire to ignite it!

2.Shoot hay to ignite it! But only when the arrow is on fire!

3.Really cool sounds!

4. Cool slick bow design

5.Much more to discover!

Future Features....

1.Weather

2.Level system

3.Multiplayer
